A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This is the movie that killed the Star Wars franchise.  This gave the middle finger to all Star Wars fans with gigantic plot holes\, terrible story telling\, unfunny jokes\, zero character development\, inexplicable character actions\, pointless side plots with political motivations and worst of all\, they ruined the character of Luke Skywalker and then killed him off in a pointless death.  I should have demanded my money back.
